name: Femdemic - An Idle World Feminization Game
name_original: Femdemic - An Idle World Feminization Game
description:
Rel.Pink makes sex-positive games that encourage all types of transgender identities (whether secret or public) and feminization kinks and fetishes. Don’t be afraid to say who you are – and live out your feminization fantasies.

Lead an alien bacterial race that induces male to female body transformations, one cell at a time. But as your hosts embrace their new bodies, the politicians close in… Femdemic is a witty, trans-affirming idle clicker with two story paths that explore gender, happiness, and femininity.

Liberation is a wholesome, trans-affirming story. Lead a benevolent mission to give each trans woman the body she needs. Increasing your hosts’ self-love is crucial to success. But beware politicians as they attempt to lock down this trans awakening …

Compliance is a feminization-fetish story for mature players. Your alien bacterial race spreads to new hosts through sex, but there’s a catch - All natural-born Earth women are immune. The solution: Transform infected males into new females! Change each male host into a sexy female one - then encourage them to mate and spread the infection. Operation Feminize Earth has begun.

Features


  • Idle Clicker - Grow bacterial factories to infect your hosts
  • Male to Female transformations - Witness your hosts’ evolution in real time
  • Tactical Elements - Target specific areas of your host’s body and brain to enhance productivity - and fight against human interference
  • Strategic Upgrades - Choose carefully to increase productivity
  • 200+ outfits and accessories - Customize your increasingly feminine hosts
  • Hilarious dialogue - Enjoy astute alien commentary on what it means to be human.
  • Specializations - Unlock options for your host, ranging from Redhead to Bunny Girl
  • Two distinct story modes - Liberation Mode and Compliance Mode
    • Liberation Mode - Help trans women take their rightful place in society
    • Compliance Mode - Feminize every male on the planet
